objects.text: • LUXURIOUS EAU DE PARFUM • LASTING IMPRESSION • MODERN MASCULINE

product_details.name: Good Man by MAXIMOR - Premium Eau De Parfum | Sophisticated Masculine Fragrance
product_details.description:
• Luxurious 100ml/3.3 FL.OZ eau de parfum concentration for longer-lasting scent
• Elegant blue frosted glass bottle with premium black cap design
• Professional-grade fragrance suitable for both day and evening wear
• Distinctive MAXIMOR branding with sophisticated geometric logo
• Premium quality men's fragrance in generous full-size bottle
• Sleek, modern packaging perfect for gifting or personal use
• Specially formulated eau de parfum for the contemporary gentleman
• Made with high-quality fragrance compounds for lasting impression
• Stylish and masculine bottle design that stands out on any shelf
• Perfect blend of sophistication and modern masculinity

banner_details:
This banner presents a sleek promotional design for a men’s fragrance product. It prominently features a large product image ("product_image") centered inside a decorative circular frame, enhancing focus. The heading ("heading") at the top uses bold typography with a sophisticated sans-serif font in light gray, followed by an elegant subheading ("subheading") in italic amber text. A prominent circular price tag ("price") is positioned to the right, with bold white text on a rich blue gradient background. The bottom section includes descriptive keywords ("description") in uppercase and a striking call-to-action button ("cta_button") with white text ("cta") against a vivid blue background.

**Color Palette:**
- Midnight Navy: #1A1A2E
- Slate Blue: #2C3E50
- Sky Blue: #3498DB
- Gradient Blue (price): from #0D47A1 to #1565C0
- Amber: #B7791F
- Light Gray: #E2E8F0
- Button Blue: #3182CE
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image features a sleek, modern design with a dominant cool-toned color palette, ideal for evoking sophistication and masculinity. The primary color is a deep gradient blue (#3E5B84) that transitions smoothly into a lighter steel blue (#6A8BAA), creating a clean and calming visual effect. The matte black cap (#2D2D2D) adds contrast and authority, while white text (#FFFFFF) enhances readability and elegance. The soft blending of blues conveys depth and luxury, with the color transitions subtle yet intentionally highlighted by soft lighting. This palette is perfect for an advertisement banner themed around elegance, confidence, and modern masculinity.
